item.title: Pure Heart - How Can I Get Over - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song How Can I Get Over by Pure Heart from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D.

item.title: Michael Bublé - I Believe in You - Keys of A, G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song I Believe in You by Michael Bublé from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Bm7, C, Cm, Csus2, D, E, Em, F♯m, G.

item.title: Stars Fell on Alabama // Cynthia Lin Jazz Ukulele - Cynthia Lin Music
Dennis Kamakahi - Wahine ‘Ilikea - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Wahine ‘Ilikea by Dennis Kamakahi from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Bm7, Cmaj7, D, G7, Gmaj7.

item.title: Brenda Lee - Rockin' Around The Christmas Tree - Key of G - Cynthia Lin Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Rockin' Around The Christmas Tree by Brenda Lee from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A7, Bm7, C, D, Em, G.

item.title: Extreme - More Than Words - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song More Than Words by Extreme from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: Am7, Bm7, C, Cm, D, D7, Em, G, G/B, G7, G7/B.

item.title: Billy Joel - Just The Way You Are - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Just The Way You Are by Billy Joel from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, B, B7, Bm7, D, Dm, Dmaj7, E, Em, Esus4, F, F♯m, F♯m6, G.

item.title: Huey Lewis & The News - Stuck With You - Keys of C, D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Stuck With You by Huey Lewis & The News from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Am7, Bm7, C, D, Dm, Em, F, G.

item.title: Jason Mraz - I Won't Give Up - Key of D - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song I Won't Give Up by Jason Mraz from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, C, C♯, D, Em, G.

item.title: Elton John - Bennie And The Jets - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Bennie And The Jets by Elton John from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Am, Bm7, C, C7, Cmaj7, D, D7, Em, Fmaj7, Gmaj7, G♯dim.

item.title: LeAnn Rimes - How Do I Live - Key of C - Daniel Simmons
item.description: Play along video for the song How Do I Live by LeAnn Rimes from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: A, Asus, Bm7, C, Dm, Em7, F, F♯m, G, Gsus.

item.description: Play along video for the song You've Got A Friend by Carole King from the channel Cynthia Lin Music. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, B7, Bm7, C, Cmaj7, D7, Em, F, F♯m, G, Gsus4.

item.description: Play along video for the song Speechless by Naomi Scott from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, B, Bm7, Bsus4, C, D, D7, Em, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song Straight To The Heart by Shilo Pa from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: Amaj7, Bm7, C♯m7, Dmaj7, E7.
